Ningannel 2.0 -- Female Half-Elf Bard: 10
Strength: 14 (+2) Dexterity: 16 (+3) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 14 (+2) Charisma: 18 (+4)

Assurance (Deception): Can take an automatic 22 on Deception checks
Battle Medicine: (1) Uses Medicine to restore Hit Points once per target per day
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Fascinating Performance: Can fascinate 4 targets for 1 rd with a successful Performance vs. Will
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command An Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Versatile Performance: Can use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation to Impersonate, Make An Impression, Demoralize, or to satisfy prerequisites

Hit Points: 108 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (3 max); trained)
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: None Weapons: Crossbow (+15 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Dagger (+15 1d4+2 P/S R10'; dexterity; trained); Longsword (+14 1d8+2 S/P; strength; trained); Rapier (+15 1d6+2 P [Crit +d8]; dexterity; trained)

Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 3; O3: 3; O4: 3; O5: 3; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Occult: +18 (charisma; expert) Spell DC: Occult: 28 (charisma; expert)
Spells:
Charm (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Comprehend Language (O2 Div): (2) R30' Target understands a chosen heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd the target can also speak the language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Counter Performance (O1 Foc Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Crushing Despair (O5 Enc): (2) 30' cone prevents reactions, and failure on a second save inflicts slowed 1, for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min with no second save) (heightened 7th affects a 60' cone)
Dancing Lights (O0 Evo): 1
Dimension Door (O4 Con): (2) Teleports self to a visible location within 120' (heightened 5th allows teleporting to a familiar location within 1 mile)
Dirge Of Doom (OC3 Foc Enc): (1) 30' emanation inflicts frightened 1 on foes for 1 rd
Ghost Sound (O0 Ill): 1
Hallucination (O5 Ill): (2) R30' Changes target's perception of an object or group for 1 hr (save Will target knows that it's hallucinating; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 saves to disbelieve) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets or effects last until next daily prep; 8th affects any number of targets or effects are permanent)
Haste (O3 Tra): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Heroism (O3 Enc): (2) Touched gains +1 attack, Perception, saves, and skill checks for 10 min (heightened 6th gives +2 bonus; 8th gives +3 bonus)
Hideous Laughter (O2 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 and loss of reactions while sustained (save Will inflicts loss of reactions only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts prone for 1 rd, then slowed 1 and loss of reactions)
Inspire Competence (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) R60' Allows self to use Performance to Aid an ally skill check, with normal failure counting as a success, for 1 rd
Inspire Courage (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Inspire Heroics (O4 Foc Enc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the effects of a subsequent Inspire Courage or Inspire Defense to +2, or +3 on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Invisibility (O2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Invisibility Sphere (O3 Ill): (2) 10' emanation makes creatures within invisible for 10 min or until any affected performs a hostile act (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Lingering Composition (O1 Foc Enc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd, or 4 rd on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Mage Hand (O0 Evo): 1
Resist Energy (O2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Soothe (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 Hit Points)
Suggestion (O4 Enc): (2) R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion for 1 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure effects last for 1 hr) (heightened 8th targets 10 creatures)
Tongues (O5 Div): (2) Target understands and speaks all languages for 1 hr (heightened 7th effects last for 8 hr)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Dirge Of Doom: Knows the Dirge Of Doom occult cantrip
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult)
Inspire Competence: Knows the Inspire Competence occult cantrip
Inspire Heroics: Knows the Inspire Heroics occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Lingering Composition: Knows the Lingering Composition occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Maestro: Knows the Soothe occult spell
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each level without learning a heightened version
Steady Spellcasting: Can negate spellcasting disruption with successful DC 15 flat check
Notes
Validation Errors: Language Allocation: 6 available vs. 8 allocated
